account.title: Account payout setup
account.body: We do not have a Stripe ID on file for you yet, if you went through the stripe process during signup and got redirected back to Gravit.ist, you probably just need to refresh this page. If you skipped this step and have not signuped up yet use the link below to register now to get paid.

verified.title: Document verification
verified.body: We have not had a chance to review the piloting documents you uploaded. Please allow us a hour or two in order to review it and activate your account.

terms.title: Terms of piloting
terms.body: By accepting any missions you are agreeing to our terms of use, and commiting to perform the requested task within 24 hours.
